desc: Hive and Garden (Bee Outside LLC) is an Oregon based beekeeping supply business that provides beehives, beehive components, honey, wax, nucleus colonies, queens, mason bees and a full line of beekeeping equipment. Hives and hive components are built onsite in our wood shop. Its owners previously owned Ruhl Bee Supply.

layout.text: A comprehensive guide to hive inspections and beekeeping basics with tutorials, diagrams and pictures, by John Edwards.
